info.title: Wink API
info.description:
## APIs
Not every integrator needs every APIs. For that reason, we have separated APIs into context.

- [Affiliate](/affiliate): All APIs related to selling travel inventory as an affiliate.
- [Analytics](/analytics): All APIs related to tracking metrics across a wide variety of data source segments including, more entertaining, leaderboard metrics.
- [Booking](/booking): All APIs related to creating platform bookings.
- [Channel Manager](/channel-manager): All APIs related to channel managers who want to integrate with our platform.
- [Extranet](/extranet): All APIs related to managing travel inventory and suppliers.
- [Inventory](/inventory): All APIs related to retrieve known travel inventory as it was found using the Lookup API..
- [Lookup](/lookup): All APIs related to locating inventory by region, locale and property flags.
- [Reference](/reference): All APIs related to retrieving platform-supported taxonomies.
- [TripPay Acquiring](/payment-acquiring): All APIs related to capture payment details such as a Stripe payment intent.
- [TripPay](/payment): All APIs related to TripPay account management, booking, mapping and integration features.

## SDKs
We are actively working on supporting the most used languages out there. If you don't see your language here, reach out to us with a request to officially add your language. In the meantime, if you want to roll your own SDK, you can do so by downloading the OpenAPI spec and using one of the many available OpenAPI generators available: [https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/generators](https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/generators).

- Java SDK [https://github.com/wink-travel/wink-sdk-java](https://github.com/wink-travel/wink-sdk-java)

## Usage
These features are made available to you via a [REST API](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer). This API is language agnostic.

## Versioning
We chose to version our endpoints in a way that we hope affects your integration with us the least. You request the version of our API you wish to work with via the `Accept` header and by using our custom JSON mime type. When it's time for you to upgrade, you only have to change the version number to get access to our updated endpoints. You can also choose to always work with the latest major version release by accepting application/json. We recommend the former. Example: application/vnd.payment-v`1`+json.

## Release history
- 2022-05-08: v1 - Exposed channel manager API
- 2021-07-01: v1 - Initial release


# Booking API
Welcome to the Booking Engine API - A programmer-friendly way to book inventory that was found on our platform.
We take great care in only working with properties that have quality, curated content and ways to bundle and cross sell customers with ancillary products and experiences. Suppliers have the ability to make their inventory look great and be searchable in a wide variety of ways. You can work with suppliers directly or receive payment-level pricing available to all our integration partners.

# Intended Audience
Programmers are a requirement to start integrating with wink. You will benefit from an API integration if you are new or existing travel related company that want easy access to great inventory. Examples:
- Hotel brands / chains that want to make their own booking engine
- Travel tech companies that want to create the next hot mobile travel app
- Destination sites that want to make their own booking engine
- OTAs that want access direct relationships with suppliers and better quality hotel inventory

tags.name: Test
tags.description: Simple GET request to show that your configuration works.

tags.name: Booking
tags.description: Booking endpoints allow you to create and cancel bookings as well as to retrieve all bookings.

post.description: Create a merchant booking. Expects a TripPay contract to be available and a authenticated traveler user to be making the booking.
Retrieve paginated bookings based on a query state
Create agent booking. Expects the agent to be a registered agent with TripPay and have available funds to cover the booking amount.

get.description: Retrieve a booking by its booking identifier. User needs to be authenticated.

patch.description: Cancel a booking by its booking identifier

get.description: Retrieve a list of bookings by group identifier. User needs to be authenticated.

patch.description: Cancel a group booking by its group identifier

get.description: Simple ping endpoint to test your credentials.
Resends booking confirmation email to traveler.
Retrieve bookings for a date state
List bookings by their review state
Retrieve bookings in a paginated list

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to start retrieving records for

ratePlanAvailableDaysOfWeek.title: Available days of week

disabled.description: Convenience property to quickly determine if this existing object has any active days enabled.

ratePlanAvailableDaysOfWeek.description: Days of the week on which this rate is available.

ratePlanArrivalDaysOfWeek.title: Arrival days of week

disabled.description: Convenience property to quickly determine if this existing object has any active days enabled.

ratePlanArrivalDaysOfWeek.description: Days of the week on which the guest can arrive.

ratePlanDepartureDaysOfWeek.title: Departure days of week

disabled.description: Convenience property to quickly determine if this existing object has any active days enabled.

ratePlanDepartureDaysOfWeek.description: Days of the week on which the guest can leave.

ratePlanRequiredDaysOfWeek.title: Required days of week

disabled.description: Convenience property to quickly determine if this existing object has any active days enabled.

ratePlanRequiredDaysOfWeek.description: Days of the week on which the guest has to stay at the hotel.

percent.description: A percentage of the total stay amount for an early check-in or late check-out

type.description: When the type is FIXED, fixedAmount is required. When the type is PERCENTAGE, percent is required.

percent.description: A percentage of the total stay amount for an early check-in or late check-out

type.description: When the type is FIXED, fixedAmount is required. When the type is PERCENTAGE, percent is required.

ratePlanSingleOccupancyRateModifier.title: Single occupancy rate modifier

percent.description: A percentage of the total stay amount for an early check-in or late check-out

type.description: When the type is FIXED, fixedAmount is required. When the type is PERCENTAGE, percent is required.

ratePlanSingleOccupancyRateModifier.description: How much extra to charge if a single individual stays in a room meant for more two or more people.

ratePlanExtraPaxRateModifier.title: Extra pax rate modifier

percent.description: A percentage of the total stay amount for an early check-in or late check-out

type.description: When the type is FIXED, fixedAmount is required. When the type is PERCENTAGE, percent is required.

ratePlanExtraPaxRateModifier.description: How much to charge for one extra adult staying in the room. Example: Included occupancy for a room type is 2 but it allows for 3 people to stay. This sets how much the third person should be charged extra.

ratePlanExtraChildRateModifier.title: Extra child rate modifier

percent.description: A percentage of the total stay amount for an early check-in or late check-out

type.description: When the type is FIXED, fixedAmount is required. When the type is PERCENTAGE, percent is required.

ratePlanExtraChildRateModifier.description: How much to charge for a child staying in the room. Example: Included occupancy for a room type is 2 but it allows for 3 people to stay. This sets how much the third person should be charged extra.

bookingUserSpecifiedCurrencyTotal.title: User specified currency total
bookingUserSpecifiedCurrencyTotal.description: The total amount for this booking in user defined currency.

bookingSourceTotal.title: Source total
bookingSourceTotal.description: The total amount for this booking in property defined currency.

bookingInternalTotal.title: Internal total
bookingInternalTotal.description: The total amount for this booking in payment-defined currency (SGD).

bookingContactInfo.title: Contact info
bookingContactInfo.description: Contact details of the hotel for the traveler to see.

bookingAddress.title: Address
bookingAddress.description: Address of the hotel for the traveler to see.

moneySetUserSpecifiedCurrencyTotal.title: User specified currency total
moneySetUserSpecifiedCurrencyTotal.description: The total amount in user defined currency.

moneySetSourceTotal.title: Source total
moneySetSourceTotal.description: The total amount in property defined currency.

moneySetInternalTotal.title: Internal total
moneySetInternalTotal.description: The total amount in payment-defined currency (SGD).

name.description: Use as title or short text description

description.example: This is a longer description that explains its relationship to parent nicely.

language.description: Indicate which language this description is written in.

startDate.description: Date start time when reservation was made for.

endDate.description: Date end time when reservation was made for.

allDay.description: Indicates if this reservation is for the whole day.

attendees.description: Number of guests that are part of this reservation.

AncillaryRequest.description: Extra reservations of spas, meeting rooms etc that should accompany the room type booking.

BookingUserRequest.description: User object contains details of the person that made the booking.

rooms.description: List of room configuration booking requests. Each entry is a separately booked room.

engineConfigurationIdentifier.description: Optionally include the specific configuration used to make the booking. If no identifier is included, it will default to the primary application configuration.

startDate.description: Date when guest arrives on the premises.

endDate.description: Date when guest departs the premises.

promotionalCodes.description: List of promotional codes the user entered to to activate a promotion.

items.description: List of promotional codes the user entered to to activate a promotion.

roomRateIdentifier.description: The unique master rate that made the guest room / rate plan available for sale.

bedType.description: Guest can optionally request a specific bed type if the room type is set up with multiple bed type choices. Example: 9 is a `Single`. Taken from the `BED` OTA specification.

packageOffers.description: Unique package identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

items.description: Unique package identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

addOnOffers.description: Unique add-on identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

items.description: Unique add-on identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

ancillaries.description: Extra reservations of spas, meeting rooms etc that should accompany the room type booking.

specialRequests.description: A guest can send a special request to the hotel in free-text here.
specialRequests.example: Can I please have rose petals on my pillows when I arrive?

traceId.description: traceId is a way to track multiple booking contracts

MerchantBookingRequest.description: List of room configuration booking requests. Each entry is a separately booked room.

featuredInd.description: Indicates whether this inventory is featured. Use this flag as a way to signify that this inventory is special.

lifestyleType.description: Indicate the type of lifestyle this inventory should be associated with.

multimedias.description: List of images / videos of inventory.

commissionable.description: Indicate whether sales channels receive commission for selling this inventory.

proximityCode.description: Supported OTA specification `PRX` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

sort.description: Use this property to sort an inventory in a list of activities.

minAgeAppropriateCode.description: Supported OTA specification `AQC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

bookable.description: Indicates if this inventory can be added to a booking or if it is read-only marketing material only.

active.description: Modify inventory availability with this flag.

disabilityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `PHY` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

securityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `SEC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

socials.description: Social network accounts for inventory (if applicable).

applicableStart.description: Start month and day or date for which the attraction (e.g. the start of a season) is available. This date property signifies that the inventory is recurring and / or seasonal. If the date is in the past, only day and month will be used to infer seasonality. If the date is a future date, it will be interpreted as a starting date.

applicableEnd.description: End month and day or date for which the attraction (e.g. the start of a season) is available. This date property signifies that the inventory is recurring and / or seasonal. If the date is in the past, only day and month will be used to infer seasonality. If the date is a future date, it will be interpreted as a ending date.

reservationRequiredInd.description: Indicates whether a reservation is required to participate in this inventory.

opens.description: Opening time of inventory (if applicable). Leave empty if inventory is always available.

closes.description: Closing time of inventory (if applicable). Leave empty if inventory is always available.

percentDiscount.description: Expected savings. Indicate how much the traveler is [usually] saving by booking it through this payment. Example: 20% discount.

numberOfUnits.description: Total number of add-ons available to purchase.

pricingType.description: Pricing types define how this add-on is sold.

ratePlanIdentifier.description: Pass an optional rate plan identifier if you want to add more complex restrictions to this add-on. Example: You want the add-on to only be available when a specific room is available.

mandatory.description: Make this add-on mandatory for all guests by enabling this flag.

AddOn.description: The original add-on record created by the property.

addOnImageUrl.description: Populated for when we send out confirmation emails to travelers.

offerDetails.description: Localized offer details if any apply

promotion.description: If an add-on is linked to a rate plan the user could be entitled to a promotional discount if she enters a code. When this field is populated, it means the discount was applied to the add-on.

guests.description: Number of guest that will be using this add-on.

nights.description: Number of nights the guests will be staying.

AddOnOffers.description: Add-on offers travelers booked together with the room.

bedTypeCode.description: Indicates the type of bed(s) found in the room. Typical values would be Double, Twin, Queen, or King. Supported OTA specification `BED` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory).

quantity.description: Number of beds for this bed type.

test.description: Whether this was a test booking by the property than can safely be deleted again

date.description: Date and time the booking was made.

groupIdentifier.description: Unique record identifier for the collection of bookings that were made at the same time.

bookingCode.description: Unique user-friendly booking geoname. This code should be used when corresponding with travelers.

socials.description: List of all social network account property has for the traveler to get in touch.

emailHeaderLogoUrl.description: Full url of the image logo optimized for emails

logoIdentifier.description: Logo cloudinary identifier for potential reuse

specialRequests.description: Free text where the traveler can add a message to the property.

comment.description: Internal comment field the payment can add and make available to channel manager partners.

earlyCheckInChargePercent.description: Early check-in charge calculated in percent of first room night price.

lateCheckOutChargePercent.description: Early check-in charge calculated in percent of first room night price.

hotelImageUrl.description: Absolute URL of hotel image that can be used as-is

roomImageUrl.description: Absolute URL of room image that can be used as-is

commissionList.description: List of all travel inventory entries that are due a commission to the affiliate.

status.description: Convenience data point to show which status the booking currently has.

fullAddress.description: Convenience data point to return the full hotel address.

rateSource.description: Rate origin. This is usually the property channel manager.

createdDate.description: Datetime this record was first created

lastUpdate.description: Datetime this record was last updated

traceId.description: Way to track which booking contracts were made together

identifier.description: Unique identifier used to track the contract. Create a UUID for this purpose.

itemList.description: Holds one booking line item for a specific supplier.

externalSupplierIdentifier.description: Contract creator can choose to geoname this record with her own identifier

externalSupplierBookingCode.description: External booking code generated by the affiliate

cancelled.description: Optional geoname externalIdentifier to remote inventory.

canceller.description: Type of entity that cancelled the booking.

cancellerUserIdentifier.description: User identifier that cancelled the entity.

totalTokensEarned.description: Total amount of tokens minted on this contract.

cancellableWithNoCharges.description: Whether the cancellation comes at no cost to the traveler.

cancellableBySupplier.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled completely by the supplier.

cancellableByTraveler.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled completely by the traveller.

supplierItemBookingCode.description: Booking code identifying the supplier line item.

nameInEnglish.description: Name of item in English included in booking.

descriptionInEnglish.description: Short description in English of item included in booking.
descriptionInEnglish.example: This is the best deluxe king that money can buy.

pricingType.description: How to calculate the total amount.

payable.description: When to charge for this item.

externalIdentifier.description: Optional geoname externalIdentifier to remote inventory.

cancelled.description: Optional geoname externalIdentifier to remote inventory.

cancellableWithNoCharges.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled and whether cancellation charges might still occur.

cancellableWithPotentialCharges.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled and whether cancellation charges might still occur.

cancellableBySupplier.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled by the supplier. A supplier cancellation overrides the refundable

cancellableByTraveler.description: Whether the booking can still be cancelled by the traveller.

BookingContractItem.description: Holds one booking line item for a specific supplier.

transactionIdentifier.description: Unique transaction id from the vendor upon a successful sale. Agent adds their transaction identifier.

agentInvoicedDate.description: The date/time the invoice was generated

agentInvoiceIdentifier.description: The specific invoice this booking was registered on

additionalProperties.description: Vendor specific values that are returned in a successful response

vendorSpecific.description: Vendor specific values that are returned in a successful response

BookingContractPaymentDetails.description: Payment details the merchant provided us at the time of payment.

createdDate.description: Datetime this record was first created

lastUpdate.description: Datetime this record was last updated

version.description: Version property that shows how many times this document has been persisted. Document will not persist if the version property is less than current version property in the system. Result in an optimistic locking exception.

featuredInd.description: Indicates whether this inventory is featured. Use this flag as a way to signify that this inventory is special.

lifestyleType.description: Indicate the type of lifestyle this inventory should be associated with.

multimedias.description: List of images / videos of inventory.

commissionable.description: Indicate whether sales channels receive commission for selling this inventory.

proximityCode.description: Supported OTA specification `PRX` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

sort.description: Use this property to sort an inventory in a list of activities.

minAgeAppropriateCode.description: Supported OTA specification `AQC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

bookable.description: Indicates if this inventory can be added to a booking or if it is read-only marketing material only.

active.description: Modify inventory availability with this flag.

disabilityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `PHY` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

securityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `SEC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

socials.description: Social network accounts for inventory (if applicable).

applicableStart.description: Start month and day or date for which the attraction (e.g. the start of a season) is available. This date property signifies that the inventory is recurring and / or seasonal. If the date is in the past, only day and month will be used to infer seasonality. If the date is a future date, it will be interpreted as a starting date.

applicableEnd.description: End month and day or date for which the attraction (e.g. the start of a season) is available. This date property signifies that the inventory is recurring and / or seasonal. If the date is in the past, only day and month will be used to infer seasonality. If the date is a future date, it will be interpreted as a ending date.

reservationRequiredInd.description: Indicates whether a reservation is required to participate in this inventory.

opens.description: Opening time of inventory (if applicable). Leave empty if inventory is always available.

closes.description: Closing time of inventory (if applicable). Leave empty if inventory is always available.

percentDiscount.description: Expected savings. Indicate how much the traveler is [usually] saving by booking it through this payment. Example: 20% discount.

itemDescriptions.description: Localized description of items contained in package.

numberOfUnits.description: Total number of packages available to purchase.

pricingType.description: Specifies how the package is priced.

ratePlanIdentifier.description: Pass an optional rate plan identifier if you want to add more complex restrictions to this package. Example: You want the package to only be available when a specific room is available.

Bundle.description: The original package record created by the property.

hotelIdentifier.description: Property this cancellation is associated with

refundable.description: Whether this cancellation policy is refundable or not

advanceCancellationFreeOfCharge.description: When the cancellation policy is refundable, this flag can be set and indicates there is more rules involved than just a no-questions-asked refundable.

refundableCancellationCharge.description: If advanceCancellationFreeOfCharge rules is not honored, this property explains what the guest will be charged.

noShowCharge.description: In case the 'Refundable cancellation charge' is set, a different no show charge can be applied.

nonRefundableCancellationCharge.description: When the cancellation policy is non-refundable, this flag can be set and indicates there is more rules involved to calculate what the guest will owe in case of a cancellation.

nonRefundableDeadline.description: The non-refundable charge might can have a deadline. If that deadline passes, the guest might be charged more.

nonRefundableAfterDeadlineCancellationCh.description: If the guest does not honor the non-refundable deadline rule, this charge dictates what she owes after the deadline passes.

CancellationPolicy.description: Based on the itinerary, the cancellation policy could be taken directly from the rate plan or it could be a policy exception also listed on the rate plan

startDate.description: Start date for when this cancellation policy should start to override the default cancellation policy.

endDate.description: End date for when this cancellation policy should end overriding the default cancellation policy.

CancellationPolicyExceptions.description: Allows a property to dynamically use another cancellation policy for a specific date range

CommissionableEntry.description: List of all travel inventory entries that are due a commission to the affiliate.

date.description: The date this rate is applicable for.

DailyRate.description: In case of LODGING, include daily rates

disabled.description: Convenience property to quickly determine if this existing object has any active days enabled.

DowPatternGroup.description: Indicate which days this inventory is open.

defaultCurrency.description: Control which currency your users see prices in initially.

defaultLanguage.description: Control which language your users see text in initially.

logos.description: Customize booking confirmation emails by adding a custom logo to your configuration.

hostedBookingEngineUrl.description: If you are self-hosting our booking engine, let us know where it is hosted. Note: This url needs to be secured with SSL.

selfHosted.description: Flag to indicate you are self-hosting our booking engine and not using our default booking engine url.

numberOfAdvanceDays.description: You can control the initial itinerary date used to retrieve travel inventory prices. You can do it in one of two ways: 1. Dynamically set the date by indicating how long and how many days in advance (this field), of today's date, you want to display prices for. 2. Set a fixed date to display prices for. Option 1 is the most shared. Option 2 is for when you want to create a new customization and apply it to a specific event that occurs on a specific date. If you don't use either of these options, the itinerary will default to today's date with one night stay. ONLY populate this field if you want to control the itinerary date. Also, leave `startDate` and `endDate` empty.

numberOfStayDays.description: You can control the initial itinerary date used to retrieve travel inventory prices. You can do it in one of two ways: 1. Dynamically set the date by indicating how long (this field) and how many days in advance, of today's date, you want to display prices for. 2. Set a fixed date to display prices for. Option 1 is the most shared. Option 2 is for when you want to create a new customization and apply it to a specific event that occurs on a specific date. If you don't use either of these options, the itinerary will default to today's date with one night stay. ONLY populate this field if you want to control the itinerary date. Also, leave `startDate` and `endDate` empty.

startDate.description: Set a fixed itinerary start date. ONLY populate this field if you want to fix the itinerary date. Also, leave `numberOfAdvanceDays` and `numberOfStayDays` empty.

endDate.description: Set a fixed itinerary end date ONLY populate this field if you want to fix the itinerary date. Also, leave `numberOfAdvanceDays` and `numberOfStayDays` empty.

roomConfigurations.description: Control how many adults / children will be staying and how many rooms. Defaults to: One room, two adults.

useDays.description: if true, we use numberOfAdvanceDays / numberOfStayDays properties - false, we use startDate / endDate

promotionalCodes.description: If you've received special promotional codes from suppliers to give to your audience, you can choose to bake these code directly into the price by entering them here.

items.description: If you've received special promotional codes from suppliers to give to your audience, you can choose to bake these code directly into the price by entering them here.

sendBookingNotificationEmailsToProperty.description: An integrator can choose to disable outgoing emails to properties because they want to do that themselves.

sendBookingNotificationEmailsToBooker.description: An integrator can choose to disable outgoing emails to users because they want to do that themselves.

wcBookClickAction.description: Action to complete once a user clicks on the CTA button on inventory.

EngineConfigurationBookingReport.description: Which engine configuration record did the entity application used to facilitate in making this booking happen.

EngineConfigurationTheme.description: Choose how you want our web components to look and more closely match with your own site style.

startDate.description: Date start time when reservation was made for.

endDate.description: Date end time when reservation was made for.

allDay.description: Indicates if this reservation is for the whole day.

attendees.description: Number of guests that are part of this reservation.

imageUrl.description: Absolute URL to image of inventory

localizedName.description: Name of travel inventory in traveler language (if available). Defaults to English.

localizedDescription.description: Description of travel inventory in traveler language (if available). Defaults to English.

ExtraCharge.title: Items
ExtraCharge.description: List of extra charges that applies to the rate plan.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of extra charges that applies to the rate plan.

GeoJsonPoint.description: Geo-location point where inventory takes place. Defaults to location of property.

GeoJsonPolygon.description: Map bounds the user is looking. Bounds provided by map provider.

GeoName.description: GeoNames have been created at [https://geonames.org](https://geonames.org) and contain geographical destinations we use as geoname data to associate travel inventory with a location.

featuredInd.description: Indicates whether this inventory is featured. Use this flag as a way to signify that this inventory is special.

lifestyleType.description: Indicate the type of lifestyle this inventory should be associated with.

multimedias.description: List of images / videos of inventory.

commissionable.description: Indicate whether sales channels receive commission for selling this inventory.

proximityCode.description: Supported OTA specification `PRX` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

sort.description: Use this property to sort an inventory in a list of activities.

minAgeAppropriateCode.description: Supported OTA specification `AQC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

bookable.description: Indicates if this inventory can be added to a booking or if it is read-only marketing material only.

active.description: Modify inventory availability with this flag.

disabilityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `PHY` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

securityFeatures.description: Supported OTA specification `SEC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

socials.description: Social network accounts for inventory (if applicable).

maxOccupancy.description: Maximum number of guest allowed in a room type.

minOccupancy.description: Minimum number of guests allowed in a room type.

quantity.description: Defines the number of rooms of this type

beds.description: A room type can have more than one bed configuration.

size.description: Number of square meters that defines the size of this room type.

maxAdultOccupancy.description: Maximum number of adults allowed in a room type.

maxChildOccupancy.description: Maximum number of children allowed in a room type.

maxRollaways.description: Maximum number of rollaway beds allowed in this room type.

roomCategory.description: Indicates the category of the room. Typical values would be Moderate, Standard, or Deluxe. Supported OTA specification `SEG` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

floor.description: Floor an which a room is located

roomLocationCode.description: Indicates the location of the room within the hotel structure. Typical values would be "Near Exit","Close to elevator", "Low Floor" or "High Floor". Supported OTA specification `RLT` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

roomViewCode.description: Indicates the view of the room. Typical values would be "Ocean view", "Pool view" or "Garden View". Supported OTA specification `RVT` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

composite.description: Indicates that the room (suite) is a composite of smaller units.

compositeCount.description: Number of rooms of this room type that makes up a larger unit (composite) such as a two bedroom suite could be comprised of two king rooms plus other room types. A 0 means disabled.

roomClassificationCode.description: Specifies the room classification (e.g., cabin, apartment). Supported OTA specification `GRI` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

roomArchitectureCode.description: Specifies the architectural style of a room. Supported OTA specification `ARC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

roomGender.description: Used to request or specify a gender assignment for a room. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

sharedRoomInd.description: If TRUE, the room requires or has sharing available. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

maxCribs.description: Maximum number of cribs allowed in a room type.

amenities.description: Collection of room amenity items available to the guest. Supported OTA specification `RMA` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

includedAdultOccupancy.description: The number of pax the room price was meant for

includedChildOccupancy.description: The number of children the room price was meant for

identifier.description: Unique record identifier. This is NOT the same as the unique hotel record identifier.

localName.description: Hotel local name if different from the trade name or if it is the local language.

chain.description: Name of hotel chain if applicable.

urlName.description: Unique URL-friendly name slug of hotel

starRating.description: Official or self-designated property star rating. Note that in some regions there are 6-star hotels. They are the same as 5-star hotels everywhere else.

bookings.description: Number of bookings for this property on the wink.travel payment.

aggregateReviewRating.description: Aggregate score based on all current user reviews.

shortDescriptions.description: A localized list of short property descriptions

longDescriptions.description: A localized list of longer property descriptions

aggregateGreendexRating.description: Aggregate Green Index score if the property has answered our questionnaire available in the Extranet.

lifestyleTypes.description: A list of lifestyles the property associates with.

items.description: A list of lifestyles the property associates with.

totalReviews.description: Count of total reviews left by users at this property.

available.description: Flag indicating whether the payment has made this property available for sale.

hotelAvailable.description: Flag indicating whether the property has made this property available for sale.

thirdPartyReviews.description: Array of awards and third party reviews given to property by certified / non-certified providers.

attractions.description: Number of attractions property has listed on its profile.

recreations.description: Number of activites property has listed on its profile.

pois.description: Number of places property has listed on its profile.

restaurants.description: Number of restaurants property has on its profile.

meetingRooms.description: Number of meeting rooms property has on its profile.

spas.description: Number of spas property has on its profile.

bundles.description: Number of packages property has on its profile.

upgrades.description: Number of add-ons property has on its profile.

fullNameOfGeneralManager.description: Full name of the property's current and active general manager.

profilePictureIdentifierGeneralManager.description: Cloudinary identifier referencing image of general manager.

messagesOfGeneralManager.description: A list of localized welcome messages created by the property's general manager.
messagesOfGeneralManager.example: We are excited to see you on our premises sooner than you can say lickedy split!

locationCategory.description: Supported OTA specification `LOC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

segmentCategory.description: Supported OTA specification `SEG` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

hotelCategory.description: Supported OTA specification `PCT` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

architecturalStyle.description: Supported OTA specification `ARC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

multimediaIdentifier.description: Featured image identifier for this property.

imageIdentifier.description: Featured Cloudinary image identifier for this property.

imageAngle.description: Meta data information about image angle that gives integrators a chance to crop this image properly.

videoIdentifier.description: Featured Cloudinary video identifier for this property.

membershipRateDiscount.description: Average percent member discount weighed across all sales channels.

priceScore.description: A property's price score is based on calculating historical pricing data. Each property receives a unique score. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

perkScore.description: A property's perk score is based on the type of perks that is offered to the guests across all master rates. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

packageScore.description: A property's package score is based on general availability and price for all packages and add-ons offered by the property. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

loyaltyScore.description: A property's loyalty score is based on calculating how many available rate plans honor loyalty points. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

popularScore.description: A property's popular score is based on calculating number of bookings across room types. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

experienceScore.description: A property's experience score is based on how calculating how many types of experiences are available and at what price ranges. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

availabilityScore.description: A property's availability score is based on general availability of all room types. If most room types are always unavailable, the attractiveness of this property goes down. We use this as our primary benchmark to decide how and when to feature properties. There is no max score; it's there to compare it against other properties.

views.description: Total number of user views of this property.

hotelAmenityCodes.description: Supported OTA specification `HAC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

items.description: Supported OTA specification `HAC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

propertyAccessibilityCodes.description: Supported OTA specification `PHY` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

items.description: Supported OTA specification `PHY` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

propertySecurityCodes.description: Supported OTA specification `SEC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

items.description: Supported OTA specification `SEC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms / keys for this property.

active.description: A property is considered active when both available and hotelAvailable flags are true.

urlParameters.description: Convenience data point that creates url friendly query parameters of property.

guests.description: Total number of adults and children

hours.description: Number of hours between start and end dates. Used for itineraries that require bookings that occur within hours and not days. E.g. Meeting room reservation.

userSpecifiedCurrencyPromotionalModifier.description: Promotional modifiers in user specified currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyPremiumModifier.description: Premium modifiers in user specified currency

sourceChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in hotel currency

internalChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in user specified currency

identifier.description: Use this identifier to communicate with Cloudinary.

hotelIdentifier.description: Owner identifier of property that owns the multimedia record.

type.description: Whether Cloudinary media is a VIDEO or IMAGE.

source.description: Currently ONLY using Cloudinary to store all image / video assets.

sort.description: Sort allows you to control how you want to sort this record in a list of media records.

published.description: Instead of deleting the media, choose to un-publish it instead for later re-use. Could be you keep seasonal images of the property.

category.description: Supported OTA specification `PIC` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

captions.description: Localized media captions to give user some context about where this media was taken.

lifestyleType.description: Associate this media with a specific lifestyle type. A user searching and filtering inventory based on lifestyles can be shown relevant media first.

isLandscape.description: True if media width is greater or equal to height

packageImageUrl.description: Populated for when we send out confirmation emails to travelers.

offerDetails.description: Localized offer details if any apply

promotion.description: If a package is linked to a rate plan the user could be entitled to a promotional discount if she enters a code. When this field is populated, it means the discount was applied to the package.

PackageOffers.description: Package offers travelers booked together with the room.

gender.description: Identifier the gender of the customer.

birthDate.description: Indicates the date of birth as indicated in the document, in ISO 8601 prescribed format.

childQuantity.description: The number of children of the customer.

citizenship.description: Name of the (self-professed) country that is clamided for citizenship.

preferredCurrency.description: Type of funds preferred for reviewing monetary values, in ISO 4217 codes

language.description: The primary language of the customer

contactPerson.description: Array of emergency contact information for the customer

Personal.description: Detailed customer information for this profile

propertyLocationPref.description: Indicates preference for hotel property locations.

propertyTypePref.description: Indicates preference for hotel property types.

hotelChainPref.description: Identifies a preferred company by name.

propertyAmenityPref.description: Indicates preferences for hotel property amenities.

recreationSrvcPref.description: Indicates preference for the type of recreation services in a hotel

businessSrvcPref.description: Indicates preference for type of business services in a hotel

securityFeaturePref.description: Indicates preference of rtype of security features in a hotel

physChalFeaturePref.description: Indicates preferences for type of features required to meet the needs of persons with physical challenges, disabilities, etc.

items.description: Indicates preferences for type of features required to meet the needs of persons with physical challenges, disabilities, etc.

smokingAllowed.description: Indicates preference for smooking allowed rooms..

roomLocationPref.description: Indicates preference for hotel room locations.

bedTypePref.description: Indicates preferences for the size and features of hotel bed types.

foodSrvcPref.description: Indicates preferences for type of food listener facilities in a hotel.

roomAmenityPref.description: Indicates preferences for hotel room amenities.

share.description: Indicates whether the user wants to share this profile of themselves with hotel(s)

Profile.description: A user profile accompanies this booking IF user has created and enabled sharing of profile

childrenMinimumAge.description: When a property allows children, it can also indicate what the minimum age is for children to be allowed.

internetAvailability.description: Indicates the availability of internet on the property.

internetConnectionType.description: Indicates how guests can access the Internet on the property.

internetConnectionLocation.description: Indicates where internet is available in and around the property.

parkingAvailability.description: Indicates whether parking is available at the property.

parkingAccess.description: Indicates what type of parking is available at the property.

petsAllowed.description: Indicates whether pets are allowed on the property. Note: There are thousand different kinds of pets. Just because the property allows small dogs does not mean the guest can bring a python. Always best to check with property.

checkOutTime.description: When the guest has to check out.

checkInTime.description: When the guest can check in.

Quote.description: The quote used to create totalCapturePrice.

name.description: Provides the name of the rate plan.

prepaid.description: When true, indicates if the rate is a prepaid rate.

enabled.description: Whether rate plan is active or not.

breakfast.description: When true, indicates breakfast is included.

brunch.description: When true, indicates brunch is included.

lunch.description: When true, indicates lunch is included.

dinner.description: When true, indicates dinner is included.

sellStartDate.description: Set a start date for when to start selling this rate. When sellStartDate and sellEndDate are set, this rate is only available for sale within that date range.

sellEndDate.description: Set an end date for when to finish selling this rate. When sellStartDate and sellEndDate are set, this rate is only available for sale within that date range.

stayStartDate.description: Set a start date for when the guest can visit. When stayStartDate and stayEndDate are set, this rate is only available for stay within that date range.

stayEndDate.description: Set an end date for when the guest can visit. When stayStartDate and stayEndDate are set, this rate is only available for stay within that date range.

loyaltyPointsAccrue.description: Property honors loyalty points with this rate plan.

maxAdvanceBookingOffset.description: Maximum days before the arrival date for which this rate plan may be booked.

minAdvanceBookingOffset.description: Minimum days before the arrival date for which this rate plan may be booked.

minTotalOccupancy.description: Defines the minimum number of total occupants required for this rate plan.

maxTotalOccupancy.description: Defines the maximum number of total occupants required for this rate plan.

minLOS.description: Indicates the minimum length of stay required for this rate plan.

maxLOS.description: Indicates the maximum length of stay.

minAge.description: The minimum age to qualify for this rate plan.

maxAge.description: The maximum age to qualify for this rate plan.

ratePlanLevelFees.description: This can be a one-time fee such as a cleaning fee

cancellationPolicyIdentifier.description: The cancellation policy for this rate plan.

RatePlan.description: An optional rate plan can be applied to the add-on. The rate plan can help to create availability restrictions.

descriptions.description: List of localized descriptions for this fee.

RatePlanLevelFee.description: What the guest is paying extra for

type.description: Type of rating system the recognition operated on. This allows us to display the score properly.

provider.description: The name of the entity that administers this recognition.

rating.description: The actual award or rating received by the hotel facility.

maxRating.description: Use this to let hotels indicate what the total score for this award is.

date.description: The date the award was received

officialAppointmentInd.description: When true, this indicates the property has received official permission from the award provider to use the rating in publications and marketing materials; when false this permission has not been granted.

ratingSymbol.description: Provides the symbol used in the rating. Used in conjunction with the Rating.

Recognition.description: Array of awards and third party reviews given to property by certified / non-certified providers.

identifier.description: Unique review identifier identifying this record.

bookingIdentifier.description: Booking identifier identifier booking this review is associated with.

hotelIdentifier.description: Hotel identifier this booking is associated with.

averageScore.description: Total points divided by number of questions.

messageFromGuest.description: Private message from guest to the hotel. Is not displayed on property profile.
messageFromGuest.example: Dear GM, I would like to say thank you so much for taking the time to show my husband and I around the premises and the secret cave behind the property.

responseFromHotel.description: Property can response to traveler review. Response goes on public review profile and can be seen by others.
responseFromHotel.example: It was so great to have you at our hotel. Please recommend your friends and come again soon.

imageIdentifier.description: Reviewer can upload her best picture from the property. Cloudinary image identifier.

text.description: Free text record created by traveler
text.example: Our stay was amazing! Can recommend highly to all. Felt like home.

approvedText.description: Hotel allows the review text to be displayed as part of their profile.

approvedImage.description: Hotel allows the user-generated image to be displayed as part of their profile.

likes.description: List of member identifiers who liked the textual review

roomNumber.description: Guest's room number during their stay.

completed.description: When the guest has completed the first and second part of the review.

responded.description: Returns true if property has responded to the review given gy the guest.

Review.description: User review created by the traveler after the booking completed.

ReviewUser.description: User details of creator of booking.

rooms.description: Number of rooms. Always 1 since we switched to creating one booking per room.

bedType.description: Supported OTA specification `BED` code. See [OTA geoname data](#operation/showAvailableCodesForCategory)

adults.description: The actual amount of adults as determined by the hotel's policy.

children.description: The actual amount of children as determined by the hotel's policy.

perkTypes.description: List of perks that came with the master rate

items.description: List of perks that came with the master rate

roomNights.description: Total number of nights the guest stays at the hotel. -1 indicates there is an error.

RoomStay.description: All information about the room that was booked.

maxDistance.description: A user can query for hotels that are close to UserSession.location

lifestyle.description: A user can filter inventory on a lifestyle

starRating.description: A user can filter on number of hotel stars

SearchFilters.description: How user likes to have results displayed

name.description: Use as title or short text description

description.example: This is a longer description that explains its relationship to parent nicely.

language.description: Indicate which language this description is written in.

SimpleDescription.description: Localized offer details if any apply

location.description: URL or social network identifier to social network profile

enabled.description: Whether social network is available for use.

sourceExtraPaxModifier.description: Extra person modifier in hotel currency.

internalExtraPaxModifier.description: Extra person modifier in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyExtraPaxModifier.description: Extra person modifier in user specified currency

sourceExtraChildModifier.description: Extra child modifier in hotel currency

internalExtraChildModifier.description: Extra child modifier in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyExtraChildModifier.description: Extra child modifier in user specified currcency

sourceSingleOccupantModifier.description: Single occupant modifier in hotel currency

internalSingleOccupantModifier.description: Singe occupant modifier in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencySingleOccupantModif.description: Single occupant modifier in user specified currency

sourcePromotionalModifier.description: Rate discount modifiers in hotel currency

internalPromotionalModifier.description: Rate discount modifiers in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyPromotionalModifier.description: Rate discount modifiers in user specified currency

sourcePremiumModifier.description: Rate premiums modifiers in hotel currency

internalPremiumModifier.description: Rate premiums modifiers in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyPremiumModifier.description: Rate premiums modifiers in user specified currency

sourceChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in hotel currency

internalChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in wink currency

userSpecifiedCurrencyChannelModifier.description: Channel / Membership modifier in user specified currency

SubCountry.description: Country subdivision such as a state or province

refundable.description: Whether this booking is refundable or not.

advanceCancellationFreeOfCharge.description: When the cancellation policy is refundable, this flag can be set and indicates there is more rules involved than just a no-questions-asked refundable.

refundableCancellationCharge.description: If advanceCancellationFreeOfCharge rules is not honored, this property explains what the guest will be charged.

noShowCharge.description: In case the 'Refundable cancellation charge' is set, a different no show charge can be applied.

nonRefundableCancellationCharge.description: When the cancellation policy is non-refundable, this flag can be set and indicates there is more rules involved to calculate what the guest will owe in case of a cancellation.

nonRefundableDeadline.description: The non-refundable charge might can have a deadline. If that deadline passes, the guest might be charged more.

nonRefundableAfterDeadlineCancellationCh.description: If the guest does not honor the non-refundable deadline rule, this charge dictates what she owes after the deadline passes.

externalIdentifier.description: Optional geoname externalIdentifier to remote policy.

userIdentifier.description: Pass along the user identifier if user is known.

promotionalCodes.description: User can pass promotional codes to system to change prices.

items.description: User can pass promotional codes to system to change prices.

UserSession.description: User session information containing itinerary and other user related data.

field.description: Field to run aggregate function on

operator.description: Filter operator to use on field

ignoreCase.description: Make filter comparison case insensitive. Default: Case sensitive

CompositeFilterDescriptor.description: Descriptors used for filtering the result set

logic.description: Whether to filter inclusively or exclusively

filters.description: Descriptors used for filtering the result set

FilterDescriptor.description: Descriptors used for filtering result set

field.description: Field to group data set on

GroupDescriptor.description: Descriptors to group result sets by.

dir.description: Descriptors used for sorting result set

field.description: Data set field to sort on

SortDescriptor.description: Descriptors used for sorting result set.

skip.description: Number of records to be skipped by the pager.

sort.description: Descriptors used for sorting result set.

group.description: Descriptors to group result sets by.

startDate.description: Date when guest arrives on the premises.

endDate.description: Date when guest departs the premises.

promotionalCodes.description: List of promotional codes the user entered to to activate a promotion.

items.description: List of promotional codes the user entered to to activate a promotion.

roomRateIdentifier.description: The unique master rate that made the guest room / rate plan available for sale.

bedType.description: Guest can optionally request a specific bed type if the room type is set up with multiple bed type choices. Example: 9 is a `Single`. Taken from the `BED` OTA specification.

packageOffers.description: Unique package identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

items.description: Unique package identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

addOnOffers.description: Unique add-on identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

items.description: Unique add-on identifiers guest wants added to her booking. Note: these add-ons must be available as part of the room type to be able to add them to a booking.

ancillaries.description: Extra reservations of spas, meeting rooms etc that should accompany the room type booking.

specialRequests.description: A guest can send a special request to the hotel in free-text here.
specialRequests.example: Can I please have rose petals on my pillows when I arrive?

externalSupplierBookingCode.description: External booking code generated by the affiliate

externalTransactionIdentifier.description: External transaction identifier populated when agent responsible for acquiring

AgentBookingRequest.description: List of room configuration booking requests. Each entry is a separately booked room.

rooms.description: List of room configuration booking requests. Each entry is a separately booked room.

traceId.description: Integrator can choose to include a unique identifier to help identify the collection of bookings

success.description: Whether call to endpoint was successful or not.

message.description: A message indicating more textual information. Mostly used to convey an error message.

oauth2_client_credentials.description:
## Retrieve access token
Make a POST (`Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded`) request to the Token URL below. Include one POST key/value entry: `grant_type=client_credentials` and include your clientID / secretKey credentials in a Basic Auth header. E.g. `Authorization: Basic base64_encode($clientId + ':' + $secretKey)`.
## Add Bearer access token to all API requests
Once you have the access token, you can pass that along on all API requests in the authentication header: `'Authorization: Bearer $accessToken`.
Note: Tokens expire after 3 hours. Please make sure you refresh your token before that time.
